DataElement.preferredName: Therapeutic Effect Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Treatment Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The therapeutic intent for treatment of chronic Graft versus Host Disease (GVHD) at the time of clinic visit.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the therapeutic benefits of a treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Therapeutic Effect; a drug's intended effect or result.

Concepts.definition: Beneficial responses or outcomes in the prevention, treatment, or progression of a disease resulting from treatment intervention. Therapeutic effect includes prevention or reduction of adverse effects. (NCI)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Treatment Therapeutic Intent Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases.  Onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._Therapeutic; relating to or involved in therapy._An anticipated outcome that is the purpose for actions taken, thus guiding the action._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Increase; a process of becoming larger or more numerous or more important.: (sis-TEM-ik THER-a-pee) Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.: Caused by or resulting from.: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Therapy Therapeutic Intent Type
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases.  Onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Therapeutic; relating to or involved in therapy.:Intent; an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions.:Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
Relating to or involved in therapy.
An anticipated outcome that is the purpose for actions taken, thus guiding the action.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
